COLUMBIA CITY WELCOMES YOU WITH BRAND NEW, CONDO-QUALITY APARTMENT HOMES!
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 617 Sq.
In the heart of vibrant Columbia City, steps from the LINK light rail station, Encore is a brand new 96-unit apartment home community.
Live just 15 minutes from downtown Seattle and Sea-Tac Airport, and a short stroll to Columbia City attractions and open spaces.
Relax amid modern and luxurious finishes, innovative floor plans, and views of Mount Rainier.
Enjoy home with plenty of extras - including a rooftop terrace, community lounge, fitness center and so much more.
- Choice of three designer color schemes
- Soaring high ceilings with oversized window walls
- Spacious community lounge with kitchen and fireplace
- Immediate Light Rail access to take you downtown or to SeaTac airport in under 20 minutes
- Bike room tuning station and storage
- Rooftop deck with Mt. Rainier views
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
